ygData.subject: Re:  Deities
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congrats..  I have two of each, but banked them. ... We need to keep /BUGging Verant to fix it. Try after each patch update and a few of us have mud
ygData.messageBody:
Chrysiana scrolled:

> I managed to make the "small protection deity"

Congrats.. I have two of each, but banked them.

> Is this still "broken" in that it cannot be equipped?

We need to keep /BUGging Verant to fix it.

Try after each patch update and a few of us have mud
throwers on the Test Server that could check ahead.
Admittedly, my three young'ns haven't gotten there
hands dirty yet.

> My other question is where can I buy Wolf's Eye Agates
> outside Neraik?

I found mine in the West Freeport Arcane Mage Guild.
One of the two female vendors as you pop-in has them.

I'll have to check again, but there is another Vendor
who sells Gems/Spell Components near the 3rd INN just
before the West Commons zone.

Cleric Taven [Veeshan]
